other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm with borderline early-repolarization abnormality and T-wave inversions in leads V1 and V2.

other_tests.procedure_name: Bronchoscopy with endobronchial ultrasound-guided needle biopsies
other_tests.findings: Revealed faint mucosal granularity in the right-sided airways, particularly the posterior right bronchus intermedius and right-lower-lobe bronchus. Biopsies showed non-necrotizing granulomas.
